knimeNode.name: Simple Regression Tree Predictor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Applies regression from a regression tree model by using the mean of the individual predictions.

fullDescription.intro: Applies regression from a regression tree model by using the mean of the individual predictions.
fullDescription.option: If this option is set, one can give a custom prediction column name, otherwise a default name of the format "Prediction (targetColumn)" is used.
Name of the output column. It contains the predicted value based simple regression tree model.
